articles.content: The decision to rent or buy depends on many things like interest rates, local real estate prices and your long-term plans. Use this calculator to help you determine which option makes the most sense … [+7 chars]

articles.author: Lauren Fox and Annie Grayer, CNN
articles.title: House Budget Committee votes to advance their Covid relief bill
articles.description: The House Budget Committee voted Monday to advance President Joe Biden's $1.9 trillion relief package, setting up the legislation aimed at fighting the Covid-19 pandemic and its economic fallout to go to the House floor for a vote later this week.

articles.title: What will my monthly mortgage payment be?
articles.description: Accurately calculating your monthly mortgage payment can be a critical first step in buying a home. Use our mortgage calculator to to get a sense of what you might pay each month.
articles.content: Accurately calculating your monthly mortgage payment can be a critical first step when determining your budget. Enter your details below to figure out what you might pay each month.

articles.description: Buying a home is a major commitment - and expense. Use our calculator to get a sense of how much house you can afford.

articles.author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: The stunning political power of AOC
articles.description: Last Thursday, New York Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez (D) announced her plan to raise money to help victims of the extreme weather -- and power grid failure -- in Texas.
articles.content:
THE POINT -- NOW ON YOUTUBE!

articles.title: Bash: Cruz looking for Fox News sound bite at Garland hearing
articles.description: CNN's Dana Bash points out that Sen. Ted Cruz's (R-TX) line of questioning to attorney general nominee Merrick Garland about the partisanship of the Justice Department noticeably didn't include the Trump administration and Cruz's own role in the discourse.

articles.author: Marianne Garvey, CNN
articles.title: Amy Poehler doesn't know if UCB will reopen
articles.description: Amy Poehler is unsure about the future of the Upright Citizens Brigade, the improv theater she co-founded.

articles.title: Trump fires back at Supreme Court ruling in statement
articles.description: Former President Donald Trump issued a statement responding to the Supreme Court's ruling which will allow a New York prosecutor to obtain his tax returns for an investigation.

articles.author: Christina Maxouris, CNN
articles.title: They joined a movement focused on kindness. Some say it's helped them get through the pandemic
articles.description: Catherine Barrett says a neighbor's small act of kindness was what sparked a now-global movement focused on all things good.

articles.author: Chris Isidore, CNN Business
articles.title: The 737 Max is no longer Boeing's biggest problem, after yet another safety grounding
articles.description: The grounding of 69 of Boeing's 777-model jets following the frightening engine failure on a United Airlines flight out of Denver on Saturday underscores a larger problem facing the aircrtaft maker.

articles.author: Ryan Nobles, CNN
articles.title: Democrats draft plan for commission to investigate January 6 insurrection
articles.description: Democrats have drafted a plan for the formation of a 9/11 style commission designed to investigate what led to the January 6 Capitol insurrection.

articles.author: Shannon Liao, CNN Business
articles.title: Peloton is releasing a cheaper treadmill. It's still $2,495
articles.description: Peloton is releasing a lower-priced treadmill to become more than a purveyor of high-end stationary-bikes.

articles.title: Biden administration rolls back Trump-era citizenship civics test

articles.title: Garland gets emotional during Senate confirmation hearing
articles.description: Attorney General nominee Merrick Garland fought back tears on Monday during his confirmation hearing when he explained to senators on his panel why this role is important to him.
